title: urugAdO unnuLLam
sahitya:
urugAdO unnuLLam murugA enniDam


anupallavi

  oru pOdum undan tirunAmam tanai nAn maravAdirundu varum matiyinai nI taravE


caraNam    piravi eDutta piragu ibbhuviyilE varai ilAp-pizhai pala purinda nAn
varundi vandunnai vaNangiDum pOdu parindu aruL unadai viraindu purindiDavE
